code: export var FLIP_UP_CARD='FLIP_UP_CARD';export var SHUFFLE_CARDS='SHUFFLE_CARDS';export var CHECK_UNMATCHED_PAIR='CHECK_UNMATCHED_PAIR';export var CHECK_MATCHED_PAIR='CHECK_MATCHED_PAIR';export var MARK_PAIR_AS_MATCHED='MARK_PAIR_AS_MATCHED';export var FLIP_DOWN_PAIR='FLIP_DOWN_PAIR';export var INIT_GAME='INIT_GAME';export var GENERATE_PAIRS='GENERATE_PAIRS';export var SHOW_NUM_CARDS_SELECTION='SHOW_NUM_CARDS_SELECTION';export function showNumCardsSelection(){return{type:SHOW_NUM_CARDS_SELECTION};}export function generatePairs(numPairs){return{type:GENERATE_PAIRS,numPairs:numPairs};}export function initGame(numPairs){return{type:INIT_GAME,numPairs:numPairs};}export function flipDownPair(id1,id2){return{type:FLIP_DOWN_PAIR,id1:id1,id2:id2};}export function markPairAsMatched(id1,id2){return{type:MARK_PAIR_AS_MATCHED,id1:id1,id2:id2};}export function checkUnmatchedPair(){return{type:CHECK_UNMATCHED_PAIR};}export function checkMatchedPair(){return{type:CHECK_MATCHED_PAIR};}export function flipUpCard(id){return{type:FLIP_UP_CARD,id:id};}export function shuffleCards(){return{type:SHUFFLE_CARDS};}
